name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set - 50lbs
description: Premium cast iron adjustable dumbbells with secure spin-lock collars. Versatile for home strength training, allowing for quick weight changes between exercises.

description: Speed jump rope with ball bearing system for smooth rotation. Adjustable cable length and ergonomic handles. Ideal for cardio, boxing, and MMA training.

description: Set of 5 premium latex resistance bands ranging from extra light to extra heavy. Great for physical therapy, strength training, and full-body workouts at home.

name: Foam Roller for Muscle Recovery
description: High-density foam roller for deep tissue massage and trigger point therapy. Rejuvenates sore muscles and improves flexibility. Compact 12-inch design.

name: Cast Iron Kettlebell - 20lbs
description: Durable solid cast iron kettlebell with wide comfortable handle. Powder-coated finish to prevent corrosion. Versatile for swings, squats, and functional movements.

name: Folding Exercise Bike
description: Compact stationary bike with 8 levels of magnetic resistance. LCD monitor tracks speed, time, distance, and calories. Space-saving design for small apartments.

name: Suspension Training System
description: Professional bodyweight training kit with reinforced anchors and ergonomic handles. Develop strength, balance, and core stability using your own body weight.

name: Ab Roller with Knee Pad

name: Anti-Burst Stability Ball - 65cm
description: Thick wall stability ball for core strength, balance, and posture. Ideal for home workouts and active sitting. Includes quick inflation foot pump.

name: Pull-Up Bar for Doorway

name: Medicine Ball - 10lbs
description: Textured rubber medicine ball for rotational training and explosive movements. Durable design with non-slip grip. Great for core and strength conditioning.

name: Weighted Vest - 20lbs

name: Aerobic Stepper Platform

name: Agility Ladder and Cones Set
description: 15ft agility ladder with 12 rungs and 10 marking cones. Ideal for footwork, speed, and coordination training for various sports. Portable with carrying bag.

name: Swim Fins for Training

name: Olympic Barbell Wall Rack

name: Muscle Massage Gun

name: Adjustable Weight Bench
